programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal exchanges sweet words with Babita while riding a Ferris wheel. The rest of the Gokuldham gang enjoys the amusement park while an unknown person spies on them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After hearing about it from a Singapore local, Jethalal decides to go bungee jumping. However, he gets cold feet when he actually sees the activity for himself.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal goes missing during the trip and the Gokuldham residents split up into groups in order to find him and take him back to the hotel.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak and Jethalal run into a friend who is setting up his export business in Singapore. This leads Jethalal to believe that Sundarlal may be behind their entire trip.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Gokuldham residents get a chance to go on a luxury cruise in Singapore for three nights and four days. They soon explore the ship with great joy.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of a housing society help each other find solutions when they face common real-life challenges and get involved in sticky situations.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal finds Popatlal dancing with women on the sixth deck. Later, Bhide informs everyone about a popular show that will take place on the ship.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal becomes friendly with two girls and clicks pictures with them. Shortly after, the residents of Gokuldham receive a stern message from their sponsor.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After making the residents of Gokuldham run around, their trip sponsor reveals himself. He then reveals the reason behind his gesture and gives them some sound advice.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anjali reminds Taarak of the diet he has to follow after reaching home. Later, everyone praises Abdul for writing the thought for the day on the board in Iyer's absence.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal calls Asit and expresses his gratitude for sponsoring the trip to Singapore. Meanwhile, Goli gives his father a pleasant surprise.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Babita and Jethalal relive their Singapore trip memories with Iyer. Meanwhile, Popatlal begins his day with radiating positivity.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal spreads his positive energy around Gokuldham Society. Meanwhile, Jethalal decides to surprise Bagha and Nattu Kaka, but he is the one who ends up surprised.

programme.title: C.I.D.
programme.desc: A man's corpse is found burnt in a wrecked car. But forensic work reveals that the man died long before he ever entered his car- he was murdered.

programme.title: C.I.D.
programme.desc: CID find out that Vikas had met a man at his house before he was murdered, and try to find out his identity and deduce that it must be someone at Vikas' office.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The ladies of Gokuldham Society make plans to visit a jewellery show and ask Jethalal and Taarak to accompany them to the venue.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While Daya and the ladies visit the jewellery exhibition, Jethalal tells their husbands that they may have to buy some of the more expensive items for them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When the residents of Gokuldham Society enter the jewellery exhibition, Jethalal introduces them to Hiralal, the owner, and his wife.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: In the exhibition, the women of Gokuldham are entranced by a diamond-studded saree. Daya gets excited and asks Jethalal to rent it for her for a day.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya begs Jethalal to let her wear the diamond-studded saree worth INR 10 crore. Jethalal promises to borrow it for her from his friend, Hiralal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal is unsuccessful in getting the diamond-studded saree from Hiralal. However, Daya and her friends plead with him to get the dress by any means necessary.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Taarak decide to fulfil Daya's wish by ordering an imitation of the diamond-studded saree. They then visit a tailor named Jitu for this purpose.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide resents Jethalal bringing the diamond-studded saree to Gokuldham and confesses this to Dr Hathi. He then confronts Jethalal and tells him that Madhvi might ask for the saree as well.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Taarak bring the fake diamond-studded saree to Daya, who wears it with much joy and thanks them for fulfilling her dream.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal meets Iyer and asks him to return the diamond-studded saree to Hiralal as soon as possible so as to avoid getting in trouble.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak and Jethalal leave to return the imitation diamond saree to Jitu. However, a band of thugs see the dress and snatch it from them before fleeing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal informs the police that the diamond-studded saree has been stolen. However, when questioned, Hiralal reveals that he never gave the real saree away.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
